Message.Title: Romney Hood-Ryan-Mayans!! 2012
Message.Msg: "If you're not a member of the wealthy elite, a Romney Ryan administration will be devastating for you" Odd, an Ayn Rand devotee would vote for TARP, the auto bailouts, the US in Iraq indefinitely and other huge government expansion while the main purpose is cutting taxes for the rich beyond Bush Junior, and gutting Medicare for the seniors. This is as bad a pick as Palin but at least it's less shrill.. Don't fall for "Romney Hood" of robbing the poor and what's left of the middle class to give to the already obscenely rich. PS: And shhhh! Please keep it quiet that Obamacare is just Romney's already implemented plan in Mass. This article states it clearly: huffingtonpost.com/mitchell-bard/pick-of-ryan-for-vp-slot_b_1769932.html

Message.Title: Ebay Completed Listings = 90 Days
Message.Msg: When looking at active listings I wanted to see completed listings. When I clicked for 15 days worth I got 90 days! Tried this on a friends Ebay and also got 90 days of past listings. This is GOOD news from Ebay. . .

Message.Title: EBAY has a stake in ChannelAdvisor?
Message.Msg: The news from ChannelAdvisor makes shares go up $1.33 but Ebay has a stake in it? Can anyone say conflict of interest for ChannelAdvisor? This seems like a pure pump/dump to me. I sell sporting goods on EBAY and auction sales suck right now -- unless you are giving it away. Items are selling for half of their worth from five years ago and a lot of auctions end with no bids. To say I'm skeptical of this news is an understatement.
